articles.author: Sarah Perez
articles.title: Google Play sees 47% decline in apps since start of last year - TechCrunch
articles.description: Google Play's app marketplace is losing apps. From the start of 2024 to present, the Android app marketplace went from hosting about 3.4 million apps
articles.content:
Google Play’s app marketplace is losing apps. 
From the start of 2024 to present, the Android app marketplace went from hosting about 3.4 million apps worldwide to just around 1.8 million, according… [+3218 chars]
